name: Sounds, Hidden to be Found
description:
An audio game about waiting around and finding nice sounds.  Catch cicadas, explore drains, and talk to birds!
This game has no visual component
Sounds by Allison Walker, Code by Rebecca Dilella

Game Controls

W / Up Arrow: move forward
S / Down Arrow: move back
A / Left arrow: look left
D / Right arrow: look right
Space: sound horn
Shift: toggle auto walk
Escape: Pause

Menu Controls

Up arrow / Down arrow: navigate menu
Enter: Select
Escape: Back
